snippet: Experts said an investigation conducted by an Australian nonprofit legal advocacy group could point to criminal culpability by Sri Lanka’s leaders.
lead_paragraph: Experts said an investigation conducted by an Australian nonprofit legal advocacy group could point to criminal culpability by Sri Lanka’s leaders.

headline.main: New Inquiry on Sri Lanka Points to Possible War Crimes

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
